heading: HR01778
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION (NIA), THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA), THE DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES (DENR), THE NATIONAL ECONOMIC AND DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY (NEDA) AND THE DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS (DPWH) TO INITIATE AND INSTITUTIONALIZE THE CREATION OF A MULTI-SECTORAL LOCAL WATER RESOURCE PROGRAM IN THE FIRST DISTRICT OF ILOCOS SUR
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS since 2018-03-19
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01778
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE NATIONAL IRRIGATION ADMINISTRATION (NIA), THE DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE (DA), THE DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES (DENR), THE NATIONAL ECONOMIC AND DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY (NEDA) AND THE DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC WORKS AND HIGHWAYS (DPWH) TO INITIATE AND INSTITUTIONALIZE THE CREATION OF A MULTI-SECTORAL LOCAL WATER RESOURCE PROGRAM IN THE FIRST DISTRICT OF ILOCOS SUR
